tool_description: 3Des Decryption API to easily decrypt any TripleDes (3Des) encrypted file once the keyfile is supplied.
name: 3Des Decyption API
title: 3Des Decyption API

api_list.name: 3Des Decryption
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://3des-decyption-api.p.rapidapi.com/3desdecrptionAPI.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "3des-decyption-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://3des-decyption-api.p.rapidapi.com/3desdecrptionAPI.php"
